original_text: The Lord will enter into judgment with the ancients of his people, and the princes thereof: for ye have eaten up the vineyard; the spoil of the poor is in your houses.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 장로들과 고관들을 심문하러 오시리니 포도원을 삼킨 자는 너희이며 가난한 자에게서 탈취한 물건이 너희의 집에 있도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord will enter into judgment
with the ancients of his people
for ye have eaten up the vineyard
the spoil of the poor is in your houses
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자들의 전리품이 너희 집들 안에 있도다
